title: why does riot hate frontier communications so much
body: like clockwork, now that its 5pm pst my ping jumped to 200.  been doing this for over 2 weeks now.  every. single. day.  once it hits 8 my ping will go back down to 63.  it seems to be affecting almost if not all frontier users, and it is getting super annoying.  riot, you need to contact them and fix this shit.
